display.tooltip:
Classic mode: The way the Uptime applet have always worked.

Simple mode: The first two non-zero values of year,day,hour and minute.

Complex mode: Use %y,%d,%h and %m to insert time values into the pattern field. Use %H and %M to insert hours and minutes with a leading zero for values less than ten.

minimal_mode.tooltip: Just an icon, uptime in tooltip.

show_icon.tooltip: Show or hide the icon. Not available in minimal mode.

prefix.tooltip: Text shown before the uptime text, for example 'Uptime :'.

pattern.tooltip: Use %y,%d,%h and %m to insert time values. Use %H and %M to insert hours and minutes with a leading zero for values less than ten.

text_css.tooltip: A CSS style applied to the text in the panel.
